text: Humne apne Rasoolon ko saaf saaf nishaniyon aur hidayaat ke saath bheja, aur unke saath kitaab aur mizaan (balance) nazil ki taakay log insaf par qayam hon. Aur loha (Iron) utara jis mein bada zoar hai aur logon ke liye munafa hai. Yeh isliye kiya gaya hai ke Allah ko maloom ho jaye ke kaun usko dekhe bagair uski aur uske rasoolon ki madad karta hai. Yaqeenan Allah badi quwwat wala aur zabardast hai
